quotes.message: There's always some amount of gradual, slow burning destruction over the course of partying.
quotes.name: Gavin Degraw

quotes.message: Never be the first to arrive at a party or the last to go home, and never, ever be both.
quotes.name: David Brown

quotes.message: No party is any fun unless seasoned with folly.
quotes.name: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.message: Nothing makes you more tolerant of a neighbor's noisy party than being there.
quotes.name: Franklin P Jones

quotes.message: Life may not be the party we hoped for, but while we're here we should dance.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: When you're out there partying, horsing around, someone out there at the same time is working hard. Someone is getting smarter and someone is winning. Just remember that.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: At every party there are two kinds of people -- those who want to go home and those who don't. The trouble is, they are usually married to each other.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: When you work hard...it's only fair that you party hard.
quotes.name: Conor Maynard

quotes.message: Enjoy your life...let loose, party hard and just have a good time.
quotes.name: Demi Lovato

quotes.message: Party like there is no tomorrow!
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: I am thankful for the mess to clean after a party because it means I have been surrounded by friends.
quotes.name: Nancie J. Carmody

quotes.message: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: At a dinner party one should eat wisely but not too well, and talk well but not too wisely.
quotes.name: William Somerset Maugham
